sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { addIssue } from '../service/addIssue' export default class AddIssue extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { title: '', description: '', labels: [] } this.handleTitle = this.handleTitle.bind(this) this.handleDescription = this.handleDescription.bind(this) } handleTitle = event => { this.setState({ title: event.target.value }) } handleDescription = event => { this.setState({ description: event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = event => { const response = addIssue(this.state.title, this.state.description, null) event.preventDefault() console.log(response) } render () { return (
//Form Modal
Create Issue
) } }
